required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: China Tongxinluo Study for Myocardial Protection in Patients With Acute Myocardial Infarction
clinical_study.official_title: China Tongxinluo Study for Myocardial Protection in Patients With Acute Myocardial Infarction

lead_sponsor.agency: China National Center for Cardiovascular Diseases

clinical_study.source: China National Center for Cardiovascular Diseases

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the therapeutic effects of Tongxinluo Capsules as compared with placebo in the treatment of patients with acute ST-elevation myocardial infarction (STEMI): (1) Clinical efficacy and safety at 30 days: the incidence of composite endpoints comprising major adverse cardiovascular and cerebrovascular events (MACCE, including cardiovascular death, myocardial re-infarction, emergency coronary revascularization and cerebral stroke), severe complications (including cardiogenic shock, heart failure, mechanical complications and malignant arrhythmias), and major bleeding (BARC grade III and V); (2) Clinical efficacy and safety at 1 year: the incidence of composite endpoints comprising MACCE, hospitalization due to heart failure, in-stent thrombosis, and major bleeding (BARC grade III and V), as well as all-cause mortality; (3) the effects in promoting myocardial reperfusion, reducing incidence of myocardial no-reflow, protecting ischemic myocardium, minimizing infarction size, and improving left ventricular systolic function.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: 30-day incidence of composite endpoint events comprising MACCE (including cardiovascular death, myocardial re-infarction, emergency coronary revascularization and cerebral stroke)

secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of revascularization of the primary endpoints
Incidence of cerebral stroke of the primary endpoints
30-day incidence of severe complications of STEMI including cardiogenic shock, heart failure, mechanical complications and malignant arrhythmias.

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence of bleeding in BARC（Bleeding Academic Research Committee Bleeding Standard） III and V
secondary_outcome.description: The incidence of bleeding in BARC（Bleeding Academic Research Committee Bleeding Standard） III and V at 30-day between 0-30%.

1-year incidence of composite endpoints comprising MACCE (including cardiovascular death, myocardial re-infarction, emergency coronary revascularization and cerebral stroke), re-hospitalization due to heart failure, in-stent thrombosis and major bleeding (BARC grade III and V), and the incidence of each primary endpoint event.
Symptoms improved after treatment. Evaluate all-cause mortality rate at 1 year.
Evaluation of Myocardial reperfusion and no-reflow: resolution of elevated ST-segment in ECG and incidence of no-reflow at 2h, 24h and 7 days after reperfusion therapy.

other_outcome.time_frame: 7 days, 1 month, 6 months and 1 year after medication
other_outcome.description: Normal value: 4-10, unit: 109/L.Check at 7 days, 1 month, 6 months and 1 year to see if it is within the normal range.

other_outcome.time_frame: 7 days, 1 month, 6 months and 1 year after medication
other_outcome.description: Normal value: 3.5-5, unit: 1012/L.Check at 7 days, 1 month, 6 months and 1 year to see if it is within the normal range.

other_outcome.time_frame: 7 days, 1 month, 6 months and 1 year after medication
other_outcome.description: Normal value: 110-150, unit: g/L.Check at 7 days, 1 month, 6 months and 1 year to see if it is within the normal range.

other_outcome.time_frame: 7 days, 1 month, 6 months and 1 year after medication
other_outcome.description: Normal value: 100-300, unit: 109/L.Check at 7 days, 1 month, 6 months and 1 year to see if it is within the normal range.

arm_group.description: First time given 8 capsules of Tongxinluo, then given 4 capsules of Tongxinluo, tid, po.Dosage form: capsule;Dose: 0.26g/capsule;Duration:1 year
First time given 8 capsules of placebo, then given 4 capsules of placebo, tid, po.Dosage form: capsule;Dose: 0.26g/capsule;Duration:1 year

overall_official.affiliation: Fuwai Hospital Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences

facility.name: First Teaching Hospital of Tianjin University of TCM

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: China National Center for Cardiovascular Diseases
